en_title: Secretary for Justice to visit Kuala Lumpur
zh_title: 律政司司長訪問吉隆坡

en: The Secretary for Justice, Mr Rimsky Yuen, SC, will lead a delegation of legal and dispute resolution professionals to visit Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, from November 6 to 8 to promote Hong Kong's international legal and dispute resolution services. He will also attend promotional activities to be held by the Hong Kong Trade Development Council (HKTDC) and the Hong Kong Tourism Board (HKTB).

While in Kuala Lumpur, Mr Yuen will officiate the opening ceremony of the "In Style．Hong Kong" Symposium organised by the HKTDC and speak at the thematic session on "Legal Risk Management: Key to International Trade and Investment", which is co-orgainsed by HKTDC and the Department of Justice. He will also officiate and speak at the "In Style．Hong Kong" Gala Dinner.
In addition, Mr Yuen will launch "Hong Kong Live in Kuala Lumpur", presented by the HKTB to promote Hong Kong tourism experiences.
Mr Yuen and members of Hong Kong’s legal and dispute resolution delegation will also take the opportunity to meet with relevant Malaysian officials and visit the arbitration centre in Kuala Lumpur.
He will return to Hong Kong on the evening of November 8.
zh: 律政司司長袁國強資深大律師將於十一月六日至八日，率領法律和解決爭議界專業人士代表團訪問馬來西亞吉隆坡，推廣香港的國際法律和解決爭議服務。袁國強亦會出席香港貿易發展局（貿發局）及香港旅遊發展局（旅發局）舉辦的推廣活動。
在吉隆坡期間，袁國強將為貿發局主辦的「時尚潮流．魅力香港」高峰論壇主持開幕典禮，並於貿發局和律政司合辦的「國際貿易和投資的關鍵：法律風險管理」專題研討會上致辭。他亦會為貿發局舉辦的「香港晚宴」作主禮嘉賓及致辭。
此外，袁國強會在旅發局舉辦的宣傳活動「香港活現吉隆坡」主持開幕典禮，推廣香港的旅遊體驗。
袁國強將聯同香港法律和解決爭議界代表與馬來西亞相關官員會面，以及拜訪當地的仲裁機構。
袁國強將於十一月八日晚上返港。

He will return to Hong Kong on the evening of November 8.
